values.name: Text
values.value: Hang in there. I won't let Blackburn succeed. we'll need to rescue the Lumens to stop him.

values.name: Text
values.value: Thank you, Baldur. The more Lumens you rescue, the weaker Blackburn's grip on the village becomes. Plus, for each Lumen you save, you'll earn Candela, making your torch shine brighter.

values.name: Text
values.value: Thanks, Ziya. I'll remember that. I we'll get the Lumens out of there, but to confront Blackburn, we'll need some upgrades.

values.name: Text
values.value: Head over to Dargan. He's got incredible upgrades that can help you save the Lumens more efficiently.

values.name: Text
values.value: Baldur, you've got to help us! Blackburn... He's taken the Lumens hostage, and he wants to spread darkness all around the village.

values.name: Text
values.value: Hey, Baldur! Need to make some trades? You can swap your Candela for Lux with me. Lux is invaluable in these dark times.

values.name: Text
values.value: Alright. Our first mission is to rescue the Lumens from Blackburn's clutches. We'll collect Candela, exchange it for Lux with Ziya, and then head to Baldur for some upgrades. Together, we'll bring light back to our village and put a stop to Blackburn's dark plans!
